name: The 12th Advanced Academic Rheumatology Review Course
content: Established in 2011, ADARRC is a one-stop shop for clinicians looking for a comprehensive update on adult and pediatric rheumatology. In an endeavor to bring to medical professionals the latest developments and trends surrounding rheumatology, the 12th annual Advanced Academic Rheumatology Review Course (ADARRC) will take place from 21-24 October (Friday – Monday) at Sofitel Dubai The Obelisk. ADARRC is designed with a series of lectures, workshops, and a summit delivered by global experts to ensure the attendees gain new insights, case studies, and pioneering research findings. Structured in a postgraduate platform which aims to provide the highest standard of scientific and educational content to achieve progress in the clinical care of patients with the rheumatic musculoskeletal diseases (RMDs). ADARRC aims to bring together everyone who plays a pivotal role in rheumatology — researchers, patients, providers, technologists, and policy leaders — and encourage them to work together to build a framework for health care transformation.
